laravel.code:
<?php
// إنشاء Service في Laravel
namespace App\Services;

use Illuminate\Support\Facades\Http;

class VerifixService
{
    private $apiKey = 'api_key_example';
    private $baseUrl = 'https://verifix-otp.com/api';
    
    public function sendVerification($email)
    {
        $response = Http::withHeaders([
            'X-API-Key' => $this->apiKey,
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json'
        ])->post($this->baseUrl . '/send-verification', [
            'email' => $email
        ]);
        
        return $response->json();
    }
    
    public function sendOrder($email, $orderNumber, $customerName, $totalAmount)
    {
        $response = Http::withHeaders([
            'X-API-Key' => $this->apiKey,
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json'
        ])->post($this->baseUrl . '/send-order', [
            'email' => $email,
            'order_number' => $orderNumber,
            'customer_name' => $customerName,
            'total_amount' => $totalAmount
        ]);
        
        return $response->json();
    }
}

// الاستخدام في Controller
use App\Services\VerifixService;

class OrderController extends Controller
{
    public function sendOrderEmail(Request $request)
    {
        $verifixService = new VerifixService();
        
        $result = $verifixService->sendOrder(
            $request->email,
            $request->order_number,
            $request->customer_name,
            $request->total_amount
        );
        
        if ($result['success']) {
            return response()->json(['message' => 'تم إرسال البريد بنجاح']);
        }
        
        return response()->json(['error' => 'فشل في الإرسال'], 400);
    }
}
?>

wordpress.code:
<?php
// إضافة هذا الكود إلى functions.php في WordPress
function send_verifix_verification($email) {
    $api_key = 'api_key_example';
    $url = 'https://verifix-otp.com/api/send-verification';
    
    $data = json_encode(array('email' => $email));
    
    $args = array(
        'body' => $data,
        'headers' => array(
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'X-API-Key' => $api_key
        ),
        'method' => 'POST'
    );
    
    $response = wp_remote_post($url, $args);
    
    if (is_wp_error($response)) {
        return false;
    }
    
    $body = wp_remote_retrieve_body($response);
    $result = json_decode($body, true);
    
    return $result['success'] ?? false;
}

// استخدام الدالة
$success = send_verifix_verification('user@example.com');
if ($success) {
    echo 'تم إرسال رسالة التحقق بنجاح';
}
?>
